Class DealershipImp

java.lang.Object
DealershipImp
All Implemented Interfaces:
Dealership
public final class DealershipImp extends Object implements Dealership
This class implements the interface Dealership. representing the management of a dealership
. We make the class final, to avoid any further class specialising it more.

      This method attempts to borrow an item of the library
      Parameters:

      motoID - - The id of the motorcycle to cancel its order.
